A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: If you don't know anything about the Star Wars franchise or don't really care then you will probably enjoy this movie.  However\, this movie is an absolute disgrace when it comes to being a Star Wars film.  Poor character development\, abundant plot holes\, and corny jokes are rampant in this movie. Disney has done an amazing job at ruining a franchise I love.  The Last Jedi is literally the worst Star Wars movie I've ever seen.
